alert.note: Alert for Allen; Barren; Edmonson; Warren (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 1:38PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Allen, southeastern Warren, northwestern Barren and southeastern Edmonson Counties through 115 PM CDT... At 1238 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mount Victor, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Warren, north central Allen, southeastern Edmonson and northwestern Barren Counties, including the following locations... Bristow, Hardcastle, Pondsville, Greenhill, Loving, Oakland, Claypool, Alvaton, Hays and Sunnyside. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
